content: {"name": "Gladden Community House", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- A current piece of mail is required for proof of address.\n- The food pantry is once a month but you can visit agian during their opening hours to receive fresh produce throught the month.", "email": "", "url": "gladdenhouse.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "318 South Glenwood Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Franklinton", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43223", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9522396, "longitude": -83.0288006}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 227-1600", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}]}
